reviews.review_msg: he gives you the answers to his midterms in a canvas announcement the week before exams and midterms, they are labelled as "last year's exams." They're 99% recycled USE THE INFO and also do the readings. he LOVES details. very easy grader, not hard to get an A

I took 271 & 282 with Bob. He has a mean face and his tone may come off as condescending at times. However, he is actually nice and really helpful when you reach out to him. Important thing to know is that unless you are going above and beyond, you are not getting anything past a B+. Meeting all the criteria does not ensure an A in his class.

Bob is a great lecturer. Many struggle to see the charm and passion through the monotone voice but he genuinely cares about everyone doing well in his class. He does often look down when lecturing and does warn his students about this which I think is perfectly fine as he is more focused on conveying the material in a clear and understandable way.
